hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Catalyst Multiplier Effect
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes, unexpected large (>$300M) daily BTC ETF inflows/outflows trigger amplified BTC moves when coinciding with S&P 500 futures moves in same direction (correlation >0.7 over prior 5 days), creating 1.8-2.2x return amplification versus isolated ETF flows.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETF flows represent institutional sentiment. When combined with traditional market moves in same direction, it signals broad risk-on/off sentiment convergence, attracting momentum traders and creating multiplier effect. Current Wall Street trimming forecasts increases sensitivity to institutional flows.
entry_conditions: BTC ETF net flow >$300M (inflow or outflow)
SPX futures 1-hour move >0.5% in same direction
Flow announcement within US trading hours (14:30-21:00 UTC)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC moves 1.8x the isolated ETF flow historical average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Large ETF flows with correlated SPX moves produce equal or smaller effects than isolated flows, indicating no amplification.
